title: Four funds that will soar if a Brexit deal is done by Oct 31
text:
Investors who think a Brexit deal will be struck by the end of October – when Prime Minister Boris Johnson insists the nation will leave the European Union – should put their money into the country’s smaller firms, analysts have said.

Companies listed on the FTSE 250 index in particular will benefit, as they tend to be more focused on the domestic economy which could benefit from a "Brexit bounce", they say.

Experts are tipping businesses in the house building and leisure industries, many of which are smaller, to do best.

Analysts at broker Stifel said "domestic shares" – especially in house building firms – rallied on days when a deal became increasingly likely and went down when the threat...
description: Investors who think a Brexit deal will be struck by the end of October – when Prime Minister Boris Johnson insists the nation will leave the European Union – should put their money into the country’s smaller firms, analysts have said.
